summary: An Ordinance amending Section 2, as amended, of Ordinance No. 39,565, entitled "An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the construction and installation of certain additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the municipal light and power plant and system specified and adopted in Ordinance No. 38,920, approved November 19, 1918, and making an appropriation therefor", approved June 20, 1919.
